upgrade.info: Version 1.7.13 fixes that Ema Personal Wiki had to run as administrator to work. It can now run as normal user. This also fixes the drag-and-drop issue, because running as administrator activates a mechanism that doesn't allow you to drag files from Windows Explorer to an "elevated" app.
Version 1.6.11 adds commandline support. Pass a pagename to the commandline to open that page when starting Ema.
Version 1.5.10 fixes a crash during startup on computers running XP.
Version 1.5.9 adds support for the recent Dropbox upgrade (v1.0.10).
Version 1.5.8 fixes a bug in the handling of attachments of pages that have a name with spaces in it.
Version 1.5.7 is a minor update that solves the problem that the page did not auto-update after edit on some computers.
Version 1.5 adds drag-and-drop in the edit window to create links to local files and embed images. Fixes some problems with local linking.

The new version remembers the window position between sessions and adds Ctrl+E as a shortcut key to edit a page.
Version 1.1 has better error recovery possibilities.
